sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-sem.title: #sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-semantics-evaluation Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-sem.html:
#sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-semantics-evaluation Runtime Semantics: Evaluation

The production A:A@B , where @ is one of the bitwise operators in the productions above, is evaluated as follows:

  1. Let lref be the result of evaluating A.
  2. Let lval be ? GetValue(lref).
  3. Let rref be the result of evaluating B.
  4. Let rval be ? GetValue(rref).
  5. Return ? ApplyStringOrNumericBinaryOperator(lval, @, rval).

sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-sem.title: #sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-semantics-evaluation Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-sem.html:
#sec-binary-bitwise-operators-runtime-semantics-evaluation Runtime Semantics: Evaluation

BitwiseANDExpression:BitwiseANDExpression&EqualityExpression
  1. Let lref be the result of evaluating BitwiseANDExpression.
  2. Let lval be ? GetValue(lref).
  3. Let rref be the result of evaluating EqualityExpression.
  4. Let rval be ? GetValue(rref).
  5. Return ? ApplyStringOrNumericBinaryOperator(lval, &, rval).
BitwiseXORExpression:BitwiseXORExpression^BitwiseANDExpression
  1. Let lref be the result of evaluating BitwiseXORExpression.
  2. Let lval be ? GetValue(lref).
  3. Let rref be the result of evaluating BitwiseANDExpression.
  4. Let rval be ? GetValue(rref).
  5. Return ? ApplyStringOrNumericBinaryOperator(lval, ^, rval).
BitwiseORExpression:BitwiseORExpression|BitwiseXORExpression
  1. Let lref be the result of evaluating BitwiseORExpression.
  2. Let lval be ? GetValue(lref).
  3. Let rref be the result of evaluating BitwiseXORExpression.
  4. Let rval be ? GetValue(rref).
  5. Return ? ApplyStringOrNumericBinaryOperator(lval, |, rval).
